extension.description: Quota monitoring with history trends, cache management, and config shortcuts for Google Antigravity IDE
viewsContainers.gagp-sidebar.title: Antigravity Panel
views.gagp.sidebar.name: Antigravity Panel
command.openPanel.title: Open Panel
command.showCacheSize.title: Show Cache Size
command.cleanCache.title: Clean Cache
command.refreshQuota.title: Refresh Quota
command.openSettings.title: Open Settings
config.quota.title: Quota
config.cache.title: Cache
config.debug.title: Debug
config.pollingInterval.description: Auto-refresh interval in seconds (minimum: 60s, recommended: 120s to reduce server load)
config.showQuota.description: Show quota information in the sidebar panel
config.quotaDisplayStyle.description: Choose how to display quota information in status bar
config.visualizationMode.description: Choose between grouped or individual model display in sidebar
config.visualizationMode.groups: Group models by category (Gemini, Claude, GPT, etc.) - cleaner view
config.visualizationMode.models: Show all individual models separately - detailed view
config.quotaWarningThreshold.description: Show warning color when quota falls below this percentage (default: 30%)
config.quotaCriticalThreshold.descriptio: Show critical color when quota falls below this percentage (default: 10%)
config.historyDisplayMinutes.description: Time range for usage history chart in minutes (default: 60 minutes)
config.showCacheSize.description: Display Antigravity IDE cache size in the status bar
config.autoCleanCache.description: ⚠️ NOT IMPLEMENTED - Automatically clean cache when it exceeds the warning threshold (requires confirmation)
config.cacheWarningThreshold.description: ⚠️ NOT IMPLEMENTED - Show warning when cache size exceeds this value in MB (default: 500MB)
config.debugMode.description: Enable debug mode: show raw model IDs in UI and output detailed logs to 'Antigravity Panel' channel (View > Output)
